title: JSON content for the projects page

content.name: Bellum Mechanica
content.desc: Design an engine capable of automating robo-warfare, then direct your bots to victory against other player-written AI. Inspired by chess, autochess & Battlesnakes

content.name: An Imperial Simulation
content.desc: An empire simulator that takes inspiration from Orteil's Neverending Legacy. Build and nurture a settlement in a hostile world.

content.name: AloeCMS
content.desc: A lightweight, detail-oriented CMS written in Typescript.

content.name: Mnemonist
content.desc: An opinionated tool for memorising language vocabulary (or any other set of information), that encourages users to treat their knowledge like a database.

content.name: Realmforge
content.desc: A collaborative worldbuilding platform combined with online roleplaying and idle game mechanics.

content.name: SpawnerJS
content.desc: Another framework for building Javascript UIs in a functional style. Originally written because I didn't want to learn PHP or jQuery.
